EmailTemplate.name: NCS Ambassador North London Invite to Apply (Enfield)
EmailTemplate.subject: Apply NOW to be an NCS Ambassador!!!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName}
Did you love NCS?
Want to improve your skills in public speaking and promotions?
Want to encourage the next generation to say YES to NCS?
Become an NCS Ambassador! - Support promotional events
- Run NCS stalls
- Share your amazing experiences of NCS with young people in your area.
- Apply here: http://tcsnortheastlondon.wordpress.com/ncs-ambassadors
If this sounds like the perfect chance to stay involved and stay amazing as an NCS grad, click here to write us a short paragraph (no more than 400 words) on why you would be a great candidate.
Then What?
- Apply no later than 4pm TOMORROW, Friday 16th October
- You'll be invited to training during October half term (27th or 29th - you choose)
DON’T miss out on this great opportunity to boost your CV and get an insight into the world of promotions and marketing.
The Challenge will offer support for any young person with additional needs to attend our events. Just get in touch with tcs.northlondon@the-challenge.org
Keep an eye on your emails to see if you’ve been successful
For any questions, please feel to email us back at tcs.northlondon@the-challenge.org
Good luck!
